data.audio_name: ONE OK ROCK、Avril Lavigne - Listen (Japanese Version)
data.lyrics:
﻿[id:$00000000]
[ar:ONE OK ROCK (ワンオクロック)/Avril Lavigne]
[ti:Listen]
[by:]
[hash:887cca94be45e6cb5b30e63023f55d25]
[al:]
[sign:]
[qq:]

[00:00.04]ONE OK ROCK、Avril Lavigne - Listen (Japanese Version)
[00:00.37]Written by：Taka/Nick Long/Colin Brittain
[00:00.70]ONE OK ROCK：
[00:00.84]You always call me full of regret
[00:06.56]You want me to save you again
[00:24.31]All these years the days go by
[00:27.01]I've seen you fall a million times
[00:29.89]Everybody makes mistakes
[00:33.67]Avril Lavigne：
[00:35.12]It feels so hard to watch you hurt
[00:38.10]From that pain a lesson learned
[00:41.00]This is how you find your way
[00:46.70]ONE OK ROCK：
[00:58.33]You feel so lost I've been there too
[01:00.87]Skies so dark no way through
[01:03.79]Stories only scars can tell
[01:07.92]Avril Lavigne：
[01:09.27]I've got so much love for you my friend
[01:12.68]Ride or die until the end
[01:15.46]But only you can save yourself
[01:19.75]You just have to
[01:21.40]ONE OK ROCK：
[01:21.41]Listen listen
[01:23.96]Avril Lavigne：
[01:23.98]I hope that you know
[01:26.86]Avril Lavigne：
[01:26.87]Listen listen
[01:29.67]I won't let you go
[01:32.38]Both：
[01:32.40]I wish I could save you from the pain you've been through
[01:38.31]And all I can tell you is the best thing to do
[01:43.65]ONE OK ROCK：
[01:43.67]You gotta listen listen
[01:49.88]Listen listen
[01:55.49]Listen listen
[01:58.43]Avril Lavigne：
[02:00.78]To your heart
[02:07.18]Listen listen
[02:12.59]Listen listen
[02:15.71]ONE OK ROCK：
[02:18.38]Listen listen 一つだけ
[02:24.13]Listen listen 信じよう
[02:29.68]降り止まない雨などない
[02:35.46]And all I can tell you is the best thing to do
[02:41.09]You gotta
[02:41.49]Listen listen
[02:46.86]Listen listen
[02:52.55]Listen listen
[02:57.93]To your heart
[02:59.61]To your heart
[03:00.57]Avril Lavigne：
[03:03.15]To your heart
[03:04.54]ONE OK ROCK：
[03:04.55]Listen listen
[03:09.32]To your heart
